artist: Artist: Cicciolina; Publisher: Slab-O-Concrete, Hove, U.K.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of the silhouette of a heel with an old woman sitting in the background, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 12 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: We Are Sentenced... ...To a Lifetime of Shit My Son! [Missive Device]
